snippet.title: Silica - Official Gameplay Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The battle for Baltarus begins! 🪐
Immerse yourself in the scorching deserts of Baltarus, where RTS seamlessly blends with FPS.
Buy Silica on Steam ➡️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1494420/
Buy Silica on Bohemia Store ➡️ https://store.bistudio.com/products/silica-digital-steam-key

Sign up for news ➡️ https://bit.ly/silica-subscribe
Visit our website ➡️ https://silicagame.com/

Silica is a crossover of FPS and RTS where up to 3 factions battle for control over the planet of Baltarus. Lead from above as commander, or experience the action first-hand, either alone, or with friends. Join one of two human armies, or hunt them down as the territorial aliens.

Join the community:
🪐Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SilicaGame
🪐Twitter: https://twitter.com/SilicaGame
🪐Discord: https://discord.gg/QAqhhkYmM7
🪐Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/silicathegame

Music by Scott Buckley – http://www.scottbuckley.com.au, Shortened. This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, PO Box 1866, Mountain View, CA 94042, USA
